title: Facebook : monthly brand profile follower growth 2017
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Growth rate in the y axis.
The Growth rate is appeared to be the highest at Month Sep '17 and lowest at Month Nov '17.
The difference of Growth rate between the highest and lowest Month is 3.18.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Growth rate in each Month on the y axis.
Month Sep '17 has the highest Growth rate and Nov '17 has the lowest Growth rate.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Growth rate in the y axis.
The Growth rate is appeared to be the highest at Month Sep '17 and lowest at Month Nov '17.
The difference of Growth rate between the highest and lowest Month is 3.18.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Growth rate for 5 number of Months.
The Growth rate is appeared to be the highest at Month Sep '17 and lowest at Month Nov '17.
Month  has the second highest value for Growth rate.
The highest Month Sep '17 has 3.18 more Growth rate than the lowest Month Nov '17.
Growth rate at Month Sep '17 is 3.28 , second place is  at 0.61, and thirdly is Dec '17 at 0.61.
Overall Growth rate has grew over the Months.
Month Nov '17, and Oct '17 have the same Growth rate.
The Month Nov '17 tends to be 3.34 percent lower than average.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 4.91.
